column4: I am going to install ubuntu for the first time ever. How much space should i partition from my Windows 7 Computer?
how big is your hard drive
I usually set up ubuntu in a VM, and i give it 8GB. it depends on what you want to do with it, but if you're just screwing around, 8 is fine
if you've never used linux before, you'll probably have some moments of frustration. dont give up.
